mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(DAILY_LOG,'mm-dd') AS "targetDate", CNT_USER, CNT_POST, CNT_WITHDRAWAL_USER, CNT_TRAFFIC FROM (SELECT * FROM STATISTIC ORDER BY DAILY_LOG DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<8

select to_char(daily_log,'yy-mm') AS "targetDate", SUM(CNT_USER) as "cnt_user", SUM(CNT_POST) as "cnt_post", SUM(CNT_WITHDRAWAL_USER) as "cnt_withdrawal_user", SUM(CNT_TRAFFIC) as "cnt_traffic" from statistic group by to_char(daily_log,'yy-mm') order by to_char(daily_log,'yy-mm')
SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE W_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') ORDER BY V_CNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=10
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE W_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') ORDER BY PICK_CNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA_BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN QNA_REPLY R ON B.BNO = R.BNO WHERE R.RNO IS NULL AND TO_CHAR(B.REG_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')

SELECT B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.REG_DATE FROM ( SELECT B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.NICKNAME, B.REG_DATE FROM QNA_BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN QNA_REPLY R ON B.BNO = R.BNO WHERE R.RNO IS NULL AND TO_CHAR(B.REG_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') ORDER BY B.BNO DESC) B WHERE ROWNUM<=5
